thread.title: Asml Stock: AI Drives Ambitious 2030 Targets
thread.title_full: Asml Stock: AI Drives Ambitious 2030 Targets

author: aktiencheck.de AG
title: Asml Stock: AI Drives Ambitious 2030 Targets
text:
ASML, the leading provider of lithography systems for the semiconductor industry, reaffirms its ambitious long-term goals despite short-term challenges. The Dutch company aims for annual revenue between 44 and 60 billion euros by 2030, with a target gross margin of 56 to 60 percent. This optimistic forecast is based on the growing importance of artificial intelligence (AI) and the associated increasing demand for advanced semiconductors. ASML's ability to further develop its EUV technology and expand its lithography portfolio positions the company favorably in the AI sector. The stock market responded positively to this news, with ASML shares rising 6.99 percent to 671.60 euros.
Market Challenges and Growth Potential
Despite recently lowering its revenue forecast for 2025 due to customer hesitancy, ASML remains confident in its long-term outlook. The company sees ongoing digitalization and advancements in AI technologies as strong growth drivers for the semiconductor industry. Analysts interpret the maintenance of long-term goals as a positive signal, especially given the currently challenging market environment. The possibility of future upward revisions to the forecast, should end-customer demand recover, is not ruled out. For the coming five years, the company expects an average annual revenue growth of 8 to 14 percent.
Ad
